alert.note: Alert for Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Travis County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lago Vista, or 15 miles west of Anderson Mill, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Cedar Park, Anderson Mill, Lakeway, Lago Vista, Bee Cave, Hudson Bend, The Hills, Barton Creek, Mansfield Dam, Jonestown, Briarcliff, Point Venture, Volente and Lost Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
